item.description:
Sold Out, Please Update Your RSVP! Last call. Have you purchased your tickets from Boston Uncorked?

Here is a great Holiday Wine Tasting from Boston Uncorked. The event will take place from 7:00 - 9:00 PM. It will sell out so purchase your tickets from Boston Uncorked. 

Members from Tonya's Boston Happy Hour and other groups will be joining us. "Truly Magical" is an apt description for Boston in December. The rush and anticipation of the holidays are combined with warm, festive gatherings of friends old and new. The chilly weather and spirit of the season allure us to don some elegant evening wear and turn out for enticing social gatherings with flair and cheerful anticipation.

Boston Uncorked invites you to join us in your holiday cocktail attire as we enjoy the tastes of some exceptional wines and delicious bites -- all among captivating, friendly people -- in a toast to the holiday season at The College Club of Boston. We'll enjoy the classy Grand Room of this historic club located in a beautiful Back Bay brownstone -- overlooking the sparkling white lights of Commonwealth Avenue Mall. This walkaround tasting affair will feature an array of delectable hors d' oeuvres prepared by their Chef to accompany the list of fine wines being assembled for this evening.

Tickets are $45.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance. To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com[url=http://www.bostonuncorked.com][/url] Do not call or contact the College Club of Boston.

Allow additional travel, parking, and T time as there are a number of Holiday events happening in the area that evening.

See you there!

The Red Sox Natives
item.how_to_find_us: We will E Mail those who say they have purchased tickets before the event. Meet at 6:45pm in lobby or inside upstairs during the party
item.name: SOLD OUTHoliday Toast Wine Soiree with Boston Uncorked at College Club of Boston
